      • checkValid

        public boolean checkValid(int playerNum,
                          java.lang.String move)
        checkValid - Checks whether or not the given player can make the given move. If it's a valid move, returns true and automatically makes the move.
        Parameters:
        playerNum - - player to check
        move - - A string representing the move in the parsed format
        Returns:
        - whether or not it's a valid move

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove(int playerNum,
                     java.lang.String move)
        makeMove - Puts a player in a given destination. This will make the move, always; the given player and move combo should be passed into validMove() just before makeMove().
        Parameters:
        playerNum - - The player to move
        move - - The destination to move the player to

      • removeWall

        public void removeWall(int playerNum,
                       java.lang.String wall)
        removeWall - FOR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY. Removes a wall and increments the player's wallcount. To be called just after placing a wall.
        Parameters:
        playerNum - - player number whose wallcount needs to be reverted
        wall - - the wall to remove
